Turf round 2023-12

EQualized scoring: Everyone gets 100 PPT and no PPH or yellow bonus. No benefit from having lots of zones the whole month. No disadvantage in towns with high turf activity and low PPT. Unfairness that still remains - uneven distribution of zones.
